Content: Landslide warning that had been issued to 7 areas which were affected from the adverse weather has been further extended for the next 24 hours. According to the National Building and Research Organization, people in Rathnapura, Kegalle, Galle, Kaluthara, Matara, Hambantota and Nuwara Eliya have to be cautious of landslides if the showers prevailed continuously in the areas.
